name: JioSphere
description: Web browser with built-in VPN and ad-blocker designed for the Indian market

opengraph.title: Secure Web Browser Application for All Your Needs | JioSphere
opengraph.description: JioSphere is the feature packed web browser app for TV and mobile. Enjoy VPN browsing, incognito mode, ad-blocking, live-video and more by with the Jio web browser.
